entry.title: Mailing list mode
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the functionality of responding to forum posts on the DelvingBitcoin site through email without the need to log in. The user inquiring is seeking clarification on whether it is possible to directly reply to forum threads via an email client and, if so, the method by which this can be accomplished. The response to such a query would typically include an explanation of the feature, if available, detailing the steps necessary to set up and use email-based replies for forum discussions. This could encompass information on configuring email settings, authorizing the integration with the forum, and any specific instructions on how to format and send replies to ensure they are correctly posted to the relevant thread on the forum.
